title: Squaremile777
author: Squaremile777
content: I need to provide documents to get loan i don't have any decent credit history.Who can help me i give you good money. Who can help me If you have company Also and money everything is done on my side i need just one helper who can back me up some one maybe who can confirm that i been working under you or in your company becouse Im about take loan few milions of eur in Europe i can give you good ammount If you can help me on this.Someone plz help me the money is not small i need this money really we need to make this deal the money is not small If you can help Im not greedy i give you Nice %

comments.author: hopenotlate
comments.body: Quote from: Squaremile777 on August 16, 2023, 03:35:06 PM-snip- Im about take loan few milions of eur in Europe -snip-Only  Not worth my time then, ping me when you are up for some billions

comments.author: Squaremile777
comments.body: Quote from: hopenotlate on August 16, 2023, 03:41:50 PMQuote from: Squaremile777 on August 16, 2023, 03:35:06 PM-snip- Im about take loan few milions of eur in Europe -snip-Only  Not worth my time then, ping me when you are up for some billions  Cmon... Why you say times are hard every money is good i just got good opportunity to get nice ammount of loan everything is all set only thing i need is good credetials once i meet lender i'll get the funds i have done all the preperations

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: Squaremile777 on August 16, 2023, 03:35:06 PMi need just one helper who can back me up some one maybe who can confirm that i been working under you or in your company becouse Im about take loan few milions of eur in Europe i can give you good ammount If you can help me on this.If I understand you correctly, you want someone to provide you with fake employment documents for your loan application?

comments.author: Squaremile777
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on August 16, 2023, 04:26:07 PMQuote from: Squaremile777 on August 16, 2023, 03:35:06 PMi need just one helper who can back me up some one maybe who can confirm that i been working under you or in your company becouse Im about take loan few milions of eur in Europe i can give you good ammount If you can help me on this.If I understand you correctly, you want someone to provide you with fake employment documents for your loan application?That might be not the case exacly but will considering this option Im in private wealth management and Investment business with high stakes on the table.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Let me guess, only after your loan is approved you will pay this huge sum of money. This is financial fraud and both you and the guy giving you what you want can go to jail for 20+ years.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: Squaremile777 on August 16, 2023, 05:29:04 PMThat might be not the case exacly but will considering this option I see.  You'll consider the option of committing felony fraud, but of course you'll need a complete stranger to participate?  Since you're willing to defraud the lender why don't you just create a fictitious company and some fictitious paystubs, and keep all the money yourself?  Why "exacly" do you need someone else to provide fraudulent documents?Quote from: Squaremile777 on August 16, 2023, 05:29:04 PMIm in private wealth management and Investment business with high stakes on the table.I was constipated this morning, but I had a smoothie for breakfast so I should be raising the stakes on the toilet any minute now.
